definitions.definition: The state of being engrossed ; concentration or preoccupation .
The fact or instance of preparing the final draft legal document for execution or completion .
Such document that has not yet been executed or completed .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The state of being engrossed ; concentration or preoccupation .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , law ) The fact or instance of preparing the final draft legal document for execution or completion .
( countable , law , informal ) Such document that has not yet been executed or completed .
